value.name: Mother Of Justus Howell, Teen Shot Dead By Zion Police, Asks Prosecutors To Reopen Case
value.description: Justus Howell old was shot in the back and killed while running away from police in Zion in 2015. The officer who fired the shots was ultimately cleared, but Howell’s mother kept on fighting.

value.name: For Tony Robinson's mother, a year of grieving
value.description: a mentally ill man fatally shot by Milwaukee police in April 2014, and Justus Howell, 17, who died in a police shooting in Zion, Illinois, a month after Robinson was killed. “I very much ...

value.name: Justus Howell
value.description: Mother Of Justus Howell, Teen Shot Dead By Zion Police In 2015, Asks Prosecutors To Reopen CaseJustus Howell was shot in the back and killed while running away from police in Zion in 2015.
